entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is a student who has been worrying. She is described as having loads of magic and is being watched by Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher who is watching Lily and commenting on her magic. He is also mentioned to be arguing with his family.

relationships.description: Snape is watching Lily in the playground and later in the leafy ground.
Snape is talking about dementors to Lily when she asks him to tell her more about them.
Lily mentions that she uses magic outside school.
